title: From the Edge of Darkness
description: Librarian's note: Alternate cover edition of ISBN 9781908599032.You are cordially invited to take a trip to the Edge of Darkness. In his first collection of short stories, Kevin Saito presents you with thirteen terrifying and macabre tales that will make the shadows around you seem much darker and the movement in the corner of your eye infinitely more sinister. In Tending the Flock, you will see the darker side of faith, devotion and redemption. Tiebreaker shows what happens when your family turns out to not be who - or what - you thought they were. Logic and reason only takes you so far in Proof Positive, while in One Shot Deal, you’ll discover what desperation really looks like. Terrifying legends, paranormal horrors and the dark depths of human depravity… All of this and more awaits you within the pages of From the Edge of Darkness. So step up, gaze into the abyss and see if the abyss truly does gaze back at you.
author: Kevin Saito
